trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlar gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>evento quando um botão para selecionar (um botão com o respetivo `CommandName` propriedade definida como "Select") é clicado, mas antes o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo processa a operação select.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the selection operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe fornecer um método de processamento de eventos que executa uma rotina personalizada, tais como cancelar a operação de seleção, sempre que este evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewSelectEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the row selected by the user and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Foi transmitido um objeto de GridViewSelectEventArgs para o método de processamento de eventos, que permite-lhe para determinar o índice da linha selecionado pelo utilizador e para indicar que a operação de seleção deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the selection operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the GridViewSelectEventArgs object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para cancelar a operação de seleção, defina o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade do objeto GridViewSelectEventArgs para `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewSelectEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de GridViewSelectEventArgs, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra o valor da propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.NewSelectedIndex%2A>|The value of the `newSelectedIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.NewSelectedIndex%2A>| O valor da `newSelectedIndex` parâmetro. | > [!NOTE] > Este construtor é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo quando gerar eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.NewSelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the new row to select in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha nova para selecionar no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the new row to select in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice da linha nova para selecionar no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control performs the select operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property of the control cannot be used to determine the index of the new row selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>evento ocorre antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo efetua a operação select, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade do controlo não pode ser utilizada para determinar o índice da linha nova selecionado pelo utilizador.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property still contains the index of the previously selected row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade contém ainda o índice da linha selecionada anteriormente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the new row selected by the user, use the NewSelectedIndex property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o índice da linha nova selecionado pelo utilizador, utilize a propriedade NewSelectedIndex.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically override the row index selected by the user by setting it to another value.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar esta propriedade para programaticamente substituir o índice de linha selecionado pelo utilizador por defini-la para outro valor.

trans-unit.source: The index of the new row to select in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha nova para selecionar no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> controlo.
